content: http://hl7.org/fhir/parameters.html is missing all the "Alternate Definitions" links at the bottom of the resource content table - ie the "Alternate definitions: Master Definition (XML, JSON), XML Schema/Schematron (for ) + JSON Schema, ShEx (for Turtle)" stuff
I think pretty much the answer is that it was a bug in the build process
parameters is a special case because it doesn't have an endpoint
Ah. So what you meant to say was "yes. that's right. it doesn't exist - please submit a change request"
(because my initial read of your response was "of course it doesn't exist - it's not supposed to" :))
The non-existence of that file is causing us validation errors
although that may be a HAPI-specific issue
well, it exists in the current build, because I fixed the bug. So I'm not welcoming a change request
Yes, I just raised GF#17904 about the current build version :)
